languages.text: "Не думаю, что ее вела ненависть к людям. Раньше мне было сложно разобрать цвета ксеносов, но теперь... я понимаю. Ирлиэт душило отчаяние".
"I do not believe she was driven by hatred of humans. I used to struggle to discern the xenos's colours, but now... I understand. Yrliet was drowning in despair."
languages.original_text: "Не думаю, что ее вела ненависть к людям. Раньше мне было сложно разобрать цвета ксеносов, но теперь... я понимаю. Ирлиэт душило отчаяние".

traits.locale_text: "I do not believe she was driven by hatred of humans. I used to struggle to discern the xenos's colours, but now... I understand. Yrliet was drowning in despair."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I do not believe she was driven by hatred of humans. I used to struggle to discern the xenos's colours, but now... I understand. Yrliet was drowning in despair."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I do not believe she was driven by hatred of humans. I used to struggle to discern the xenos's colours, but now... I understand. Yrliet was drowning in despair."

traits.locale_text: "I do not believe she was driven by hatred of humans. I used to struggle to discern the xenos's colours, but now... I understand. Yrliet was drowning in despair."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: “我认为她那么做并非出于对人类的憎恨。我之前很难分辨异形的色彩，可现在……我明白了，伊莉耶特生前被绝望吞没了。”
languages.original_text: "I do not believe she was driven by hatred of humans. I used to struggle to discern the xenos's colours, but now... I understand. Yrliet was drowning in despair."

traits.locale_text: “我认为她那么做并非出于对人类的憎恨。我之前很难分辨异形的色彩，可现在……我明白了，伊莉耶特生前被绝望吞没了。”
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: « Je ne pense pas que la haine des humains la guidait. J'ai toujours eu beaucoup de mal à discerner ses couleurs, mais maintenant... Je comprends. Yrliet se noyait dans le désespoir. »
languages.original_text: "I do not believe she was driven by hatred of humans. I used to struggle to discern the xenos's colours, but now... I understand. Yrliet was drowning in despair."

traits.locale_text: « Je ne pense pas que la haine des humains la guidait. J'ai toujours eu beaucoup de mal à discerner ses couleurs, mais maintenant... Je comprends. Yrliet se noyait dans le désespoir. »
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: «Creo que no la guiaba el odio a los humanos. Antes me costaba distinguir los colores de los xenos, pero ahora... los entiendo. Yrliet estaba sumida en la desesperación».
languages.original_text: "I do not believe she was driven by hatred of humans. I used to struggle to discern the xenos's colours, but now... I understand. Yrliet was drowning in despair."

traits.locale_text: «Creo que no la guiaba el odio a los humanos. Antes me costaba distinguir los colores de los xenos, pero ahora... los entiendo. Yrliet estaba sumida en la desesperación».
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: 「彼女が人間への憎悪に駆られたとは思えません。異種族の色を見定めるには苦労するものですが、今なら…わかるのです。ユリエットは絶望に沈んでいました」
languages.original_text: "I do not believe she was driven by hatred of humans. I used to struggle to discern the xenos's colours, but now... I understand. Yrliet was drowning in despair."

traits.locale_text: 「彼女が人間への憎悪に駆られたとは思えません。異種族の色を見定めるには苦労するものですが、今なら…わかるのです。ユリエットは絶望に沈んでいました」
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Ich glaube nicht, dass sie von einem Hass gegen Menschen angetrieben wurde. Ich hatte früher Mühe, die Farben der Xenos auszumachen, doch nun ... Nun verstehe ich es. Yrliet ist in Verzweiflung ertrunken."
languages.original_text: "I do not believe she was driven by hatred of humans. I used to struggle to discern the xenos's colours, but now... I understand. Yrliet was drowning in despair."

traits.locale_text: "Ich glaube nicht, dass sie von einem Hass gegen Menschen angetrieben wurde. Ich hatte früher Mühe, die Farben der Xenos auszumachen, doch nun ... Nun verstehe ich es. Yrliet ist in Verzweiflung ertrunken."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.original_text: "I do not believe she was driven by hatred of humans. I used to struggle to discern the xenos's colours, but now... I understand. Yrliet was drowning in despair."

languages.text: "İnsan nefretiyle beslendiğine inanamıyorum. Zeno renklerini ayırt etmekte zorlanıyordum ama... Artık anlıyorum. Yrliet, çaresizlik denizinde boğuluyormuş."
languages.original_text: "I do not believe she was driven by hatred of humans. I used to struggle to discern the xenos's colours, but now... I understand. Yrliet was drowning in despair."

traits.locale_text: "İnsan nefretiyle beslendiğine inanamıyorum. Zeno renklerini ayırt etmekte zorlanıyordum ama... Artık anlıyorum. Yrliet, çaresizlik içinde boğuluyordu."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion
